original_text: The Lord said to me, ‘Son of man, look at that! The people of Judah are doing these disgusting things here in my temple! That is a terrible thing! And they are also doing violent things everywhere in their land. They continue to make me angry all the time. Look at them! They insult me as much as they can!
korean_text: 또 내게 이르시되 인자야 네가 보았느냐 유다 족속이 여기에서 행한 가증한 일을 적다 하겠느냐 그들이 그 땅을 폭행으로 채우고 또 다시 내 노여움을 일으키며 심지어 나뭇가지를 그 코에 두었느니라

sentences.original_text: Son of man, look at that!
The people of Judah are doing these disgusting things
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 백성들이 이 역겨운 일들을 하고 있다

sentences.original_text: And they are also doing violent things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 또한 폭력적인 일들을 하고 있다

sentences.original_text: They continue to make me angry
They insult me as much as they can!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 할 수 있는 한 나를 모욕한다!
